Articles.Content: How do you think politics would work on a Moon (Yeah, I know it's 1.3 ls away, but the UN can screw of when it comes to politics off Earth), Venus, Mars, Ceres, etc, etc, colony's?

Unfortunately, politics of any sort has proven to be a subject which erupts into arguments on our forum, to such an extent that we've had to institute a rule against it  (2.2.b). Sorry, but this thread will be closed now.
